Protocols/ClientConnectionResponder.html.name: availableServicesChanged(availableServiceIDs:)
Protocols/ClientConnectionResponder.html.abstract: If the ClientMessenger instance is browsing for services, this method gets called whenever a new service becomes available (or if an available service goes offline), receiving the updated service list as a parameter.

Protocols/JSONConvertibleMessage.html#/s.name: init(jsonObject:)
Protocols/JSONConvertibleMessage.html#/s.abstract: Initializes an object from a dictionary representing the JSON object. It’s called upon receiving a message

Protocols/JSONConvertibleMessage.html#/s.name: toJSONObject()
Protocols/JSONConvertibleMessage.html#/s.abstract: Transforms the instance of the message into a JSON dictionary.

Protocols/JSONConvertibleMessage.html.name: JSONConvertibleMessage
Protocols/JSONConvertibleMessage.html.abstract: A protocol that allows Tibei to convert your custom messages to a JSON format. Note that it is mandatory to represent your object as a dictionary. That’s because Tibei embeds metadata in the data before sending it.

Protocols/ClientConnectionResponder.html.name: ClientConnectionResponder
Protocols/ClientConnectionResponder.html.abstract: A specialization of ConnectionResponder with additional behavior for the client side.

Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.name: inputUnavailable
Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.abstract: Thrown if the OutputStream of a Connection can’t take any more data.

Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.name: invalidMessageType
Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.abstract: Thrown if a responder receives a message with a _type field that is not valid (i.e. is not a string).

Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.name: inputError
Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.abstract: Thrown if an error occurs while reading from a Connection‘s InputStream.

Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.name: outputError
Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.abstract: Thrown if an error occurs while writing to a Connection‘s OutputStream.

Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.name: outputStreamUnavailable
Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.abstract: Thrown if a Connection‘s output stream has no space left.

Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.name: notConnected
Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.abstract: Thrown if an attempt to send a message is made without an active Connection.

Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.name: inexistentService
Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.abstract: Thrown if an attempt to connect to a service that doesn’t exists is made.

Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.name: connectionFailure
Enums/ConnectionError.html#/s:FO5Tibei15.abstract: Thrown if an error occurred while trying to obtain a Connection‘s input and output streams.

Enums/ConnectionError.html.name: ConnectionError
Enums/ConnectionError.html.abstract: An error that may occur at any point of the connection’s lifecycle.

Classes/ClientMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.name: browseForServices(withIdentifier:)
Classes/ClientMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.abstract: Browses for services that are currently being published via Bonjour with a certain service identifier.

Classes/ClientMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.name: connect(serviceIdentifier:)
Classes/ClientMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.abstract: Connects to a service based on its provider’s identifier

Classes/ClientMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.name: disconnect()
Classes/ClientMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.abstract: Disconnects from the currently connected service. Does nothing if this messenger is not connected to any service.

Classes/ClientMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.name: sendMessage(_:)
Classes/ClientMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.abstract: Sends a message to the currently active connection.

Classes/ClientMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.name: registerResponder(_:)
Classes/ClientMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.abstract: Registers a new responder to this messenger’s responder chain.

Classes/ServerMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.name: init(serviceIdentifier:)
Classes/ServerMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.abstract: Initializes the messenger. The service will not be published through Bonjour until publishService is called.

Classes/ServerMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.name: publishService()
Classes/ServerMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.abstract: Publishes the service through Bonjour, making it discoverable to any client that searches for this server’s service identifier

Classes/ServerMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.name: unpublishService()
Classes/ServerMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.abstract: Make this server’s service undiscoverable. No clients will be able to connect from the moment this method is called.

Classes/ServerMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.name: sendMessage(_:toConnectionWithID:)
Classes/ServerMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.abstract: Sends a message to a client identified by its connection identifier.

Classes/ServerMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.name: broadcastMessage(_:)
Classes/ServerMessenger.html#/s:FC5Tibei.abstract: Sends a message to all active connections.

Classes.html#/s:C5Tibei14ResponderChain.name: ResponderChain
Classes.html#/s:C5Tibei14ResponderChain.abstract: In Tibei, incoming messages are processed by a chain of objects that may be set as responders in a chain. Responders must conform to the ConnectionResponder or ClientConnectionResponder protocols.

Classes/ServerMessenger.html.name: ServerMessenger
Classes/ServerMessenger.html.abstract: Represents a messenger that sends and receives messages on the server side.

Classes/Connection.html.name: Connection
Classes/Connection.html.abstract: Represents a single connection between server and client. The same class is used on either side.

Classes/ClientMessenger.html.name: ClientMessenger
Classes/ClientMessenger.html.abstract: Represents a messenger that sends and receives messages from the client-side.
